description.displayText: Fotini is sweet, kind, caring and does her best to make the client happy and she cares for their every needs.
description.originalText: Fotini is sweet, kind, caring and does her best to make the client happy and she cares for their every needs.

description.displayText:
Fotini is a remarkable caregiver .  She's very attentive , kind and hard working .  Such a pleasure to be around .  
Always looking to do more and help .  I give her all positives in reviews
description.originalText:
Fotini is a remarkable caregiver .  She's very attentive , kind and hard working .  Such a pleasure to be around .  
Always looking to do more and help .  I give her all positives in reviews

description.displayText:
Tina has been taking care of my 91 year old Mom since November of 2016.  We have been most pleased with her and recommend her highly for work as a companion and caregiver.  She is conscientious, prompt, polite and respectful  She goes beyond the call of duty without being asked and is always punctual.  Whenever possible she accommodates our variable schedule and has been available for short hours or overnight for weekend travel or vacations.  I am fully confident when I leave that my mom is getting the best care possible.  That is saying a great deal because I am very particular and thorough about my mother's care.  I often tell my mom that she is spoiled rotten by Tina.  My mom feels very comfortable with Tina and is always glad to see her.  

Tina stays very busy caring for others and will tell you that she absolutely loves what she does.  That is very apparent in the quality of care that she offers.  I recommend her highly for any caregiver position available.
